verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Now, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%>, wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? yea, thou shalt <S%H3045>shew<s%> her all her <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

Then <S%H559>say<s%> thou, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, The <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8210>sheddeth<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it, that her <S%H6256>time<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%>, and <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H1544>idols<s%> against herself to <S%H2930>defile<s%> herself.

Thou art become <S%H816>guilty<s%> in thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> that thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%>; and hast <S%H2930>defiled<s%> thyself in thine <S%H1544>idols<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%>; and thou hast caused thy <S%H3117>days<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near<s%>, and art <S%H935>come<s%> even unto thy <S%H8141>years<s%>: therefore have I <S%H5414>made<s%> thee a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and a <S%H7048>mocking<s%> to all <S%H776>countries<s%>.
Those that be <S%H7138>near<s%>, and those that be <S%H7350>far<s%> from thee, shall <S%H7046>mock<s%> thee, which art <S%H2931%H8034>infamous<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4103>vexed<s%>.
Behold, the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> were in thee to their <S%H2220>power<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

In thee have they set <S%H7043>light<s%> by <S%H1>father<s%> and <S%H517>mother<s%>: in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee have they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H6233>oppression<s%> with the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>: in thee have they <S%H3238>vexed<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H490>widow<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H959>despised<s%> mine holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, and hast <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>.

In thee are <S%H582>men<s%> that carry <S%H7400>tales<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>: and in thee they <S%H398>eat<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness<s%>.
In thee have they <S%H1540>discovered<s%> their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: in thee have they <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her that was set <S%H5079>apart<s%> for <S%H2931>pollution<s%>.

And <S%H376>one<s%> hath <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>; and <S%H376>another<s%> hath <S%H2154>lewdly<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his daughter in <S%H3618>law<s%>; and <S%H376>another<s%> in thee hath <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>, his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>.

In thee have they <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H7810>gifts<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>; thou hast <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> and <S%H8636>increase<s%>, and thou hast greedily <S%H1214>gained<s%> of thy <S%H7453>neighbours<s%> by <S%H6233>extortion<s%>, and hast <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

¶ Behold, therefore I have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> mine <S%H3709>hand<s%> at thy dishonest <S%H1215>gain<s%> which thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%>, and at thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> which hath been in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee.

Can thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5975>endure<s%>, or can thine <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, in the <S%H3117>days<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with thee? I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, and will <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

And I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> thee among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> thee in the <S%H776>countries<s%>, and will <S%H8552>consume<s%> thy <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> out of thee.
And thou shalt take thine <S%H2490%H5157>inheritance<s%> in thyself in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is to me become <S%H5509>dross<s%>: all they are <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and <S%H913>tin<s%>, and <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and <S%H5777>lead<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace<s%>; they are even the <S%H5509>dross<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because ye are all become <S%H5509>dross<s%>, behold, therefore I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

As they <S%H6910>gather<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and <S%H5777>lead<s%>, and <S%H913>tin<s%>, into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace<s%>, to <S%H5301>blow<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> upon it, to <S%H5413>melt<s%> it; so will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> you in mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>fury<s%>, and I will <S%H3240>leave<s%> you there, and <S%H5413>melt<s%> you.
Yea, I will <S%H3664>gather<s%> you, and <S%H5301>blow<s%> upon you in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof.

As <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H2046>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3564>furnace<s%>, so shall ye be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have poured <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon you.
¶ And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> unto her, Thou art the <S%H776>land<s%> that is not <S%H2891>cleansed<s%>, nor <S%H1656>rained<s%> upon in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2195>indignation<s%>.

There is a <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof, like a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%>; they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>; they have <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H2633>treasure<s%> and precious <S%H3366>things<s%>; they have made her <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof.

Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2554>violated<s%> my <S%H8451>law<s%>, and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> mine holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: they have put no <S%H914>difference<s%> between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H2455>profane<s%>, neither have they <S%H3045>shewed<s%> difference between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%>, and have <S%H5956>hid<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and I am <S%H2490>profaned<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> thereof are like <S%H2061>wolves<s%> <S%H2963>ravening<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%>, to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>, to <S%H1214>get<s%> dishonest <S%H1215>gain<s%>.

And her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H2902>daubed<s%> them with <S%H8602>untempered<s%> morter, <S%H2374>seeing<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, and <S%H7080>divining<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> unto them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath not <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> have used <S%H6231%H6233>oppression<s%>, and <S%H1497>exercised<s%> <S%H1498>robbery<s%>, and have <S%H3238>vexed<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>: yea, they have <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H4941>wrongfully<s%>.

And I <S%H1245>sought<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> among them, that should make <S%H1443>up<s%> the <S%H1447>hedge<s%>, and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6556>gap<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me for the <S%H776>land<s%>, that I should not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it: but I <S%H4672>found<s%> none.

Therefore have I poured <S%H8210>out<s%> mine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> upon them; I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%>: their own <S%H1870>way<s%> have I <S%H5414>recompensed<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
